string-array.name: patches
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, profile CHAR(2) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR NOT NULL, hours INTEGER NOT NULL, placements INTEGER, videoShowings INTEGER, returnVisits INTEGER, studies INTEGER);
ALTER TABLE report add column profile char(2) check (profile in (\'PU\', \'AP\', \'RP\', \'SP\');

string-array.name: unpatches
string-array.item: ALTER TABLE report drop column profile;
